Description

100 Keys To Your Heart is a short and sweet puzzle platformer indie game. You must find different keys to open doors, but picking up keys make you heavier and unable to jump as high. It's easy to pick up, but features challenging puzzles

History

Gamejam

The game started as a game jam submission for GMTK 2021, with the theme "Linked Together". It was done in 48h and ha pixel art graphics.

Full Game

The game was reworked from scratch into a full game for Steam in about 4 months of development.

Features

  • Challenging puzzles
  • 4 Environments to explore
  • 60 Keys to find
  • 8 Secret locations to discover
  • 3 Hours of gameplay
  • Available in English, Chinese, French, Italian and German
